Summary: Seen UFOs like this for months now , cochin , India
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kochi
There were no other sightings in Kochi on or around November 5th 2010
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe pic says it all . The yellow lights below in the pic are beach lights and the white dot on top of the pic is the UFO . There are many UFO's here in cochin . U can mistake them for stars except they move . I have been seeing these UFO's for months now . I think they are scouting for abducting me and the Indian govt already knows about it as there are planes all around . Helicopters and fixed wing strike air craft . The UFO's dont make any noise . They are not afraid of the govt planes . If you get in touch with me then i can show them to you . Later you can get a alienology expert team here to cochin and catch the greatest UFO scoop of the mellianium . Namely a stand off between them( aliens) and the govt .
